suburbs.name: Sandown
suburbs.summary: An upmarket suburb offering a mix of corporate offices and luxury residences, ideal for executives who want to work and live in the same area.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Crawford College Sandton and Redhill School.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Well-patrolled area with 24-hour security in most complexes and estates.
dataPoints.walkability: High walkability to Sandton City and Nelson Mandela Square.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental demand from corporate tenants and expats.

hero.alt: Lifestyle scene in Sandown, Sandton (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Sandton CBD
suburbs.summary: The financial heart of South Africa, home to the JSE and major corporate headquarters. Premium high-rise living with world-class amenities.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Several top schools within 10km including St Stithians and Crawford.
dataPoints.safetyNote: High security presence with CCTV coverage and private security patrols.
dataPoints.walkability: Excellent - Sandton City, restaurants, and offices all walkable.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Prime investment area with consistent capital growth and high rental yields.

hero.alt: Skyline view of Sandton CBD (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Hurlingham
suburbs.summary: A leafy, established suburb popular with families seeking a quieter lifestyle while remaining close to Sandton amenities.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Top-tier access: Crawford Sandton, St Stithians, and Montrose Primary nearby.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Hurlingham Manor North Association (HMNA) manages 24/7 access control at Woodlands Ave and Pinotage St.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Secure walks within the boomed enclave; short drive to Nicolway.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Stable. 2024 avg sale R4.47m. Demand high for security enclaves.

Coffee shops.name: Tashas Nicolway
Coffee shops.description: Premium cafe dining with beautiful interiors. 5 min drive.

Coffee shops.name: Seattle Coffee Co
Coffee shops.description: Reliable daily brew at the local Pick n Pay. 2 min drive.

Coffee shops.name: Naked Coffee
Coffee shops.description: Specialty roasters for the serious coffee snob.

Shopping.name: Nicolway Bryanston
Shopping.description: Upscale mall with Woolworths, Checkers, and boutique fashion.

Shopping.name: Pick n Pay on Republic
Shopping.description: Convenient essentials run. Right on the border.

Parks.name: Hurlingham Park
Parks.description: Secure community park managed by HMNA. Great for dogs.

Parks.name: Sandton Field & Study
Parks.description: Large open nature reserve with river trails.

hero.alt: Leafy, secure street in Hurlingham Manor (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Bryanston
suburbs.summary: One of Sandton's largest suburbs offering spacious properties on large stands, popular with families seeking space and excellent schools.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Excellent schools including Bryanston High, St Stithians, and Michael Mount.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Mix of open stands and security estates. Community security initiatives active.
dataPoints.walkability: Low - car-dependent suburb with scattered amenities.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Large properties attract long-term family buyers. Good value retention.

hero.alt: Spacious garden home in Bryanston (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Hyde Park
suburbs.summary: An exclusive, prestigious suburb known for luxury homes, top schools, and the upmarket Hyde Park Corner shopping centre.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Home to Hyde Park High School and near St Marys, Redhill, and Crawford.
dataPoints.safetyNote: One of the best-secured suburbs with boom gates and 24-hour patrols.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Hyde Park Corner and Jan Smuts shops accessible.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Blue-chip suburb with strong capital appreciation over decades.

hero.alt: Luxury estate in Hyde Park (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Morningside
suburbs.summary: A vibrant suburb with excellent shopping, dining, and entertainment options along Rivonia Road, attracting young professionals and families.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Redhill School, Crawford College, and Brescia House.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Active security presence with community patrols and boom-controlled access.
dataPoints.walkability: High - Morningside Shopping Centre and restaurants along Rivonia Road.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Popular rental area for young professionals. Strong rental yields.

hero.alt: Morningside cafe lifestyle (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Fourways
suburbs.summary: A rapidly developing hub in northern Johannesburg offering modern estates, excellent malls, and growing infrastructure.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Dainfern College, Fourways High, and several private schools in the area.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Many gated communities and security estates. Variable security on open stands.
dataPoints.walkability: Low to moderate - Fourways Mall accessible, otherwise car-dependent.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: High growth area with new developments. Good for capital appreciation.

hero.alt: Estate living in Fourways (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Rivonia
suburbs.summary: A well-established commercial and residential suburb known for its village atmosphere, excellent restaurants, and business park.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Redhill School and several Montessori and pre-primary options.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Community policing active. Mix of secure complexes and open residential areas.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Rivonia Village and restaurants accessible on foot.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Stable residential area with commercial uplift from business park.

hero.alt: Rivonia Village atmosphere (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Craighall Park
suburbs.summary: A charming, tree-lined suburb with a mix of old Johannesburg character homes and modern developments, close to Rosebank.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Near St Marys School, Auckland Park schools, and UJ.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Active residents association with neighbourhood watch programmes.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - local cafes and shops, Rosebank nearby.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Popular with young buyers seeking character. Steady market.

hero.alt: Character home in Craighall Park (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Inanda
suburbs.summary: An exclusive enclave home to the prestigious Inanda Country Base, offering large properties and a semi-rural lifestyle minutes from Sandton.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: St Stithians College is located in Inanda. Close to Dainfern College.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Secure estate living with controlled access and 24-hour security.
dataPoints.walkability: Low - estate living, car required for all amenities.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Trophy properties with long-term capital appreciation.

hero.alt: Equestrian lifestyle in Inanda (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Woodmead
suburbs.summary: A mixed-use suburb combining residential areas with major office parks and retail centres, offering convenience for work-from-home professionals.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to The Hill School and several pre-primary options.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Security estates and complexes offer good protection. Variable on open stands.
dataPoints.walkability: Low to moderate - Woodmead Retail Park accessible.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Good entry point for first-time buyers. Steady rental demand.

hero.alt: Woodmead office and retail park (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Benmore Gardens
suburbs.summary: An upmarket residential area adjacent to Benmore Gardens shopping centre, offering easy access to Sandton CBD and excellent amenities.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Redhill School and Crawford College Sandton.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Well-maintained suburb with active security and boom access.
dataPoints.walkability: High - Benmore Gardens centre offers shops, restaurants, and services.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Solid investment with consistent demand from professionals.

hero.alt: Benmore Gardens residential (placeholder)

suburbs.name: River Club
suburbs.summary: A secure, tree-lined enclave offering tranquil luxury living with strong investment returns, popular with families and young professionals seeking proximity to Sandton.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Redhill School, Crawford College, and St Stithians.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Gated lifestyle estates with 24/7 security and boom-controlled access.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - local amenities accessible, Rivonia Village nearby.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental yields (6-7%) and steady capital appreciation. Popular with buy-to-let investors.

hero.alt: Tree-lined streets in River Club (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Atholl
suburbs.summary: Atholl remains Sandton's most accessible luxury suburb, attracting young families and professionals with its proximity to the financial district and established amenities.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Crawford College Sandton and St David's Marist Inanda.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Mix of boomed roads and gated estates with active residents' association.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Atholl Square and Bluebird Shopping Centre accessible.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental yields (10-14% sectional); freehold appreciating +2.1% YoY.

hero.alt: Leafy street in Atholl, Sandton (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Strathavon
suburbs.summary: Strathavon remains a resilient micro-market 5–10 minutes from Sandton CBD, attracting professionals and investors who prioritise security and convenience over space.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Immediate access to Redhill School, Crawford College, and Grayston Prep.
dataPoints.safetyNote: 100% boomed estates with 24-hour security and controlled access.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - secure complexes, nearby shopping at Morningside.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental yields (11-16%); sectional title outperforming freehold.

hero.alt: Secure cluster estate in Strathavon, Sandton (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Dunkeld
suburbs.summary: Dunkeld's ultra-premium market has plateaued, with the real growth in the mid-luxury R8M–R12M segment and sectional title apartments where institutional buyers and families seek security and capital appreciation.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Immediate access to Kingsmead, St David's Marist, and Wanderers Club amenities.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Boomed roads and gated clusters with 24-hour security throughout.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Rosebank Zone accessible, local amenities within reach.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental yields (11-14%); sectional title outperforming stagnant luxury freehold.

hero.alt: Luxury estate in Dunkeld, Johannesburg (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Sandhurst
suburbs.summary: Sandhurst has plateaued at R16.5M average but remains South Africa's 7th most expensive suburb, with interest rate cuts driving renewed investor interest in this ultra-secure address.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Near Crawford College, Redhill School, and St David's Marist.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Boomed roads with private patrols; ultra-high security throughout the suburb.
dataPoints.walkability: Low - car-dependent luxury suburb with private amenities.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental yields (11-16%); flat capital appreciation but rate cuts driving optimism.

hero.alt: Luxury mansion in Sandhurst, Sandton (placeholder)

suburbs.name: Douglasdale
suburbs.summary: Young Professionals' Entry Point Near Sandton - steady demand from first-time buyers seeking affordability within reach of Sandton's CBD.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Crawford College, Redhill School, and St Stithians.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Secure lifestyle estates with 24-hour security and boomed access in modern complexes.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Douglasdale Village and shops accessible.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental yields (8-10% gross) with steady absorption from young professionals.

hero.alt: Modern lifestyle estate in Douglasdale

suburbs.name: Magaliessig
suburbs.summary: Value & Security in Fourways' Prime Node - established family homes at 20-30% lower prices than comparable Bryanston properties.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Proximity to Redhill, St. Peter's, and top-tier Fourways schools.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Secure, boomed community with 24/7 access control and low crime perception.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Fourways Mall and Design Quarter nearby.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong corporate rental demand and family appeal with 10-12% gross yields.

hero.alt: Family homes in Magaliessig with large stands

suburbs.name: Edenburg
suburbs.summary: Mixed-Use Hub with Strong Rental Yields - blends commercial vibrancy with residential convenience for young professionals and investors.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Crawford Sandton, Redhill School, and Morningside schools.
dataPoints.safetyNote: 24-hour boomed security with access control in estates; commercial presence adds activity.
dataPoints.walkability: High - Rivonia Boulevard retail/restaurants within walking distance.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Exceptional rental yields (11-16% gross) with CBD proximity driving demand.

hero.alt: Modern sectional title apartments in Edenburg

suburbs.name: Wierda Valley
suburbs.summary: Commercial Hub with Shrinking Residential Inventory - limited residential stock commands seller advantage due to CBD proximity and security.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Close to Crawford College, Redhill School, and Benmore primary schools.
dataPoints.safetyNote: 24-hour boomed security in secure complexes with access control.
dataPoints.walkability: High - Gautrain station and Inanda Greens office parks walkable.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental demand from corporate professionals; limited supply supports seller pricing.

hero.alt: Ultra-premium residential estate in Wierda Valley

suburbs.name: Kelvin
suburbs.summary: Mid-Income Haven With Gautrain Access - large stands and established family living at accessible prices.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Proximity to Redhill School, Wendywood Primary, and Sandown High.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Boomed estates and active community policing; mix of security options.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Marlboro Gautrain station easily walkable.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental yields (11-13% gross) with buy-to-let investor demand.

hero.alt: Established family homes in Kelvin suburb

suburbs.name: Buccleuch
suburbs.summary: Affordable Sectional Title Gateway to Sandton Living - strong rental yields of 12-14% attract investors and first-time buyers.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Access to local primary schools and proximity to Wendywood area schools.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Active Residents Association with varied security levels across complexes.
dataPoints.walkability: Low to Moderate - Modderfontein Nature Reserve nearby for trails.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Exceptional rental yields (12-14% gross); buyers' market favors investors.

hero.alt: Golf course views and residential homes in Buccleuch

suburbs.name: Kramerville
suburbs.summary: Premium design district with rare residential opportunities - primarily commercial showrooms and creative industry hub.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Not primarily residential - limited school access in immediate vicinity.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Commercial security presence; 24-hour patrols for business premises.
dataPoints.walkability: High walkability to design showrooms and creative businesses.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Development-focused market; commercial conversion opportunities.

hero.alt: Design district showrooms and commercial hub in Kramerville

suburbs.name: Marlboro
suburbs.summary: Emerging first-time buyer hub with Gautrain access and large affordable stands.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Marlboro Primary in area; access to Wendywood and northern corridor schools.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Mixed security - some boomed estates, some open areas.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Gautrain proximity is key transport advantage.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong entry point with 11-16% rental yields; supply tightness creates seller advantage.

hero.alt: Residential homes with Gautrain access in Marlboro

suburbs.name: Marlboro Gardens
suburbs.summary: Budget-friendly investment hub with strong rental potential and Gautrain proximity.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Local primary schools; access to Edenvale and northern suburb schooling.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Mixed security levels - boomed sections offer premium protection.
dataPoints.walkability: Low to Moderate - car-dependent suburb with highway proximity.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Exceptional 10-14% gross yields; buyer's market with negotiation room.

hero.alt: Residential townhouses and family homes in Marlboro Gardens

suburbs.name: Parkmore
suburbs.summary: Secure suburban living at Sandton prices - 23% cheaper than Bryanston with comparable security.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Top schools adjacent: Redhill, King David, St Stithians accessible.
dataPoints.safetyNote: PCA-managed security with 3-minute armed response; boomed road closures.
dataPoints.walkability: High walkability to Sandton City and major amenities.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Strong rental yields (10%+); renovation potential in mid-range homes.

hero.alt: Tree-lined streets and secure family homes in Parkmore

suburbs.name: Craigavon
suburbs.summary: Affordable urban living near Fourways growth hub - first-time buyer gateway with strong solar premium.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Broadacres Academy, Beaulieu College nearby; strong primary school network.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Boomed estates command premium; Springwood and established sectional complexes offer best security.
dataPoints.walkability: Low - car-dependent but close to Fourways retail corridor.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: 45% first-time buyers; entry prices 20-30% below Fourways.

hero.alt: Modern family home with solar panels in Craigavon secure estate

suburbs.name: Beverley
suburbs.summary: Value-rich secure urban living - 8-12% cheaper than Lonehill with comparable lifestyle estates.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Broadacres Academy, Dainfern College, Beaulieu accessible.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Premium estates (The Stables, Tanglewood, Castello) with 24-hour security.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate in estate areas; car needed for broader amenities.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Solar-equipped homes see 50-65 day sales vs 90+ for grid-only.

hero.alt: Young couple at luxury townhouse estate entrance in Beverley

suburbs.name: Dainfern
suburbs.summary: Premium golf estate lifestyle with strong expat rental demand - 20% below comparable Bryanston estates.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Dainfern College on-site; Crawford and Beaulieu nearby.
dataPoints.safetyNote: 24-hour manned security estate with controlled access; one of Johannesburg's most secure.
dataPoints.walkability: High within estate; trails, golf course, clubhouse accessible.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: Corporate tenants pay R35-48K/month; strong rental yields for premium homes.

hero.alt: Family dining on golf estate patio in Dainfern

suburbs.name: Broadacres
suburbs.summary: Lock-up-and-go hotspot with strong rental yields - 15% below Fourways for first-time buyers.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Broadacres Academy, Crawford College, Dainfern College accessible.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Mixed security - Cedar Lakes Estate offers premium; complexes vary.
dataPoints.walkability: Low to Moderate - car-dependent with some walkable estate areas.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: 8-10% gross yields; 38% first-time buyers escaping rental cycle.

hero.alt: Young professionals at pool and clubhouse in Broadacres complex

suburbs.name: Gallo Manor
suburbs.summary: Sandton's hidden gem with 11% price growth - secure family homes at 20-30% below neighboring premiums.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Wendywood schools, Redhill, Crawford College accessible.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Boomed enclaves with HOA governance; Tugela Crescent commands premium.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate - Morning Glen Mall walkable; car needed for broader access.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: 11.4% YoY growth outperforming neighbors; 10-12% rental yields.

hero.alt: Family home with children playing on lawn in Gallo Manor

suburbs.name: Wendywood
suburbs.summary: Sandton's most accessible middle-tier suburb - 10-13% rental yields with 6.3% price growth.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Wendywood High, Redhill, Crawford College in catchment.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Boomed enclosures with 24-hour gate control; Esprit Estate premium.
dataPoints.walkability: Moderate within estates; car needed for broader access.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: 10-13% gross yields; The Foundry complex sells in 6-8 weeks.

hero.alt: Professional walking dog in tree-lined Wendywood complex

suburbs.name: Illovo
suburbs.summary: Sandton's apartment capital - 82% sectional title with young professional dominance.

dataPoints.schoolsNote: Urban location; primary schools in adjacent suburbs.
dataPoints.safetyNote: Building security varies; premium complexes offer 24-hour access control.
dataPoints.walkability: High - Thrupps, cafés, Wanderers Club walkable; vibrant mixed-use precinct.
dataPoints.investmentPotential: 49% young professionals; backup power now essential for sales velocity.

hero.alt: Executive enjoying coffee on apartment balcony overlooking Sandton
